Articles.Content: I really had fun doing a tourist mission last night. The expressions of the tourist in the portrait were really great. Scared on takeoff and ascent, wonderment exiting the atmosphere and being in space. So much fun. I even went in IVA to see what it would be like from her perspective. I think I lost money on the contract though sadly, but I still had a lot of fun doing it.
And I love how they have different clothes ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) That's attention to detail right there.
I would totally go on a spaceship ride in a t-shirt and shorts. Probably wearing sandals too. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I found a tourist that must have had the BadS = true setting. She enjoyed the flight as much as Val did.

I noticed that they also gain experience at the end of the flight. I wonder if Squad will use this later for better paying, and more demanding tourism.
Tourists are saving my space program right now... I love them too.
What if after you you do a tourism mission, you have a small chance to have the kerbal cycle through the astronaut complex hire list with a small boost to a skill?
Accidently blew up my first tourist.

Dang tourists..... First tourist: Oooh! I want to orbit the Mun! Second: I want to go on Minmus! Third: Land Me on the Mun!

Me:AGHHHHH CHOOSE ONE PLACE TO GO!!!!!!!

> 
> Tourists are saving my space program right now... I love them too.

I was at 30,000 credits with no rep (because I botched my mun mission, killed val) (jeb was already dead). A tourist who wanted to go sub-orbital paid me 40,000 and saved my space program.

> 
> Dang tourists..... First tourist: Oooh! I want to orbit the Mun! Second: I want to go on Minmus! Third: Land Me on the Mun!
> Me:AGHHHHH CHOOSE ONE PLACE TO GO!!!!!!!

What, that sounds fine. If you can transport three tourists you probably have the capacity to land on the Mun and Minmus, and that's probably a lot of extra monies.

Yeah, But I usually engineer rockets to go to one place not stop at one place and then move on, so my rocket didn't have the fuel capacity(or the drills) to get off the mun so I just crashed into the lander with a rover in a fit of anger:P I just cant understand why people don't want to tour space with me anymore....![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

I seem to recall them not having helmets in the face-cam view, but I don't have a capsule with 2+ Kerbals yet to see in IVA.

I'm loving the Tourists as well! 

Poor Val got stuck with one around the Mun for a few days while I tried to figure out a rescue mission. At least she wasn't alone!

Yep, it's quite amazing that Kerbals will pay good money to go up in this:

[![ZNdRAyOl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ZNdRAyOl.jpg)](http://imgur.com/ZNdRAyO)

What's even more amazing is that they all came down in it too.

I really should unlock some more streamlined adapters ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I like how you can mix them with other missions. They can just ride along. Deliver a satellite to such and such. Drop bill and bring a tourist.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Tourist missions are actually one of my favorites as well. Unfortunately I killed the first tourist I got upon flipping on reentry...

Accidently \*cough\* killed my first tourist with Jeb, they took 35Go during the re-entry from the Mun, but the spacecraft exploded cause from overheating ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6wz1xA5kxVI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I lost Jeb trying out a dual return spacecraft for tourists.

I had a hitchhiker module with heatshield, and above that a mk1 capsule with heatshield.

I was hoping to take advantage of the larger physics bubble on separation, however I didn't separate before re-entry (which I need to try).

So during re-entry, the mk1 blew up, though I was able to stage and pop the chutes on the hitchhiker and the tourists were saved.

BTW, if you have a tourist that wants three different locations, you can do one, bring them back, then add them to a mission to another location, etc. Until you happen to hit all on their list.

doesn't have to be at once, but within the total time of the contract...

I'm also a huge fan of the tourists. They're just awesome little green dudes and dudettes that don't clog up my roster like the rescuees. 

And they're perfectly kerbal. First suborbital mission ends with the capsule flipping around and burning up? Suddenly there's 8 kerbals waving money in front of you saying "Me next!" Perfect.
